vareniki.title: Bilberry varenyky (dumplings)
vareniki.recipe: frozen varenyky are put into boiling salted water. They are brought to a boil while stirring and cooked for 5-7 minutes. Cooked varenyky are taken out from the water and dressed to taste (with butter or sour cream).
vareniki.description: premium wheat flour, quick-frozen bilberries, drinking water, white sugar, refined sunflower oil, salt.Allergens in bold.

vareniki.title: Вареники з бринзою
vareniki.description: бринза (35%), борошно пшеничне вищого ґатунку (32%), грудинка свинна (15%), вода питна, олія соняшникова рафінована, сіль кухонна, перець чорний мелений.Алергени виділені жирним шрифтом.

pelmeni.title: Bilberry varenyky (dumplings)
pelmeni.description: premium wheat flour, quick-frozen bilberries, drinking water, white sugar, refined sunflower oil, salt.Allergens in bold.
